name: RemoveCustomLabelFromRunner
description:
Remove a custom label from a self-hosted runner in an enterprise.

This tool removes a specified custom label from a self-hosted runner configured in an enterprise and returns the remaining labels. It should be called when you need to update runner labels, and requires authentication with an access token having 'manage_runners:enterprise' scope.

parameters.name: enterprise_identifier
parameters.description: Slug or ID of the enterprise. Use the slug version of the enterprise name or the enterprise ID as an alternative.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: runner_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the self-hosted runner.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

parameters.name: runner_custom_label_name
parameters.description: The name of the custom label to be removed from the self-hosted runner.

value_schema.description: The name of a self-hosted runner's custom label.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: enterprise
parameters.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

value_schema.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

parameters.name: runner_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of a self-hosted runner's custom label.

value_schema.description: The name of a self-hosted runner's custom label.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
